title: Customer_Analyzer v2: Add automatic alignment check for segment definition + messaging version on sync

sections.text: Implement an automatic alignment check when Sales_Accelerator syncs Customer_Analyzer v2 data to verify the account/opportunity’s segment definition ID and messaging version match the currently active/expected values. If a mismatch is detected, persist an “alignment_failed” status on the record and surface a non-blocking warning in the integration logs for follow-up. This ticket covers backend detection + status recording only; UI gating and “approved messaging only” draft enforcement will be handled in subsequent tickets.
